attributes.action: Mediate between Royal Mail and CWU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a postman who believes that we are well paid for the work we do, i think that the Prime Minister should step in and help get things sorted between Royal Mail and CWU, as neither side are looking like they will back down.

As postmen, we're constantly being told that Royal Mail is government owned, therefore is it not the governments duty to step in and get it sorted ??
